title: BlackRock’s Larry Fink Joins Trump Team Talks to Rebuild Ukraine
description: BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Larry Fink is back in the conversation around rebuilding Ukraine — this time with the Trump administration.
content: BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Larry Fink is back in the conversation around rebuilding Ukraine — this time with the Trump administration.
